frameset.edef: to shut or close (usually with eye)
frameset.comment: أقفل عينيه Based on roleset OagomaD-v.01

example.parse: (S (NP-PRD (NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM شعار) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN اليوم) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN العالمي)) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (DET+NOUN لسكري))))) (NP-TMP (NP (DEM_PRON_F هذه)) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC السنة))) (S-TTL-SBJ (PUNC ") (VP (PRT (NEG_PART لا)) (IV2MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:J تغمض) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_DU_ACC عيني) (NP (POSS_PRON_2MS ك))) (PP (PREP عن) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الاخطار))))
